author: Mary Meisenzahl
title: The next great mental health app will look like Pokemon Go, according to a Silicon Valley psychologist
description: Dozens of mental health apps are available in the App Store, which remind users to drink water, take note of their feelings, and more. Apps like SuperBetter adopt aspects of traditional games, like powerups and quests. According to a Silicon Valley mental hea…
content:
You probably wouldn't think of chugging a glass of water, or talking to another person as "power-ups," but app SuperBetter is reframing mental health upkeep as a game.
